mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gift_customer( id, gift_category, gift_merchant_id, transfer_merchant_code, customer_code, gift_count, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{giftCategory}, #{giftMerchantId}, #{transferMerchantCode}, #{customerCode}, #{giftCount}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks} )
